GSD.description:
eventpoll: add EPOLL_URING_WAKE poll wakeup flag

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.162 by commit 2f093775022b45253b0d8df0e7296e7bc0d13a7b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: eventpoll: add EPOLL_URING_WAKE poll wakeup flag
